sentence.Network_en: Delegates sat in rapt silence as Mrs Fisher spoke.
sentence.Network_cn: 费希尔夫人发言的时候，代表们都一言不发专心致志地听着。

sentence.Network_en: I noticed that everyone was watching me with rapt attention.
sentence.Network_cn: 我注意到大家都在专注地看着我。

sentence.Network_en: He had held his audience rapt.
sentence.Network_cn: 他令听众们都听入了迷。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... rankle 激怒>使平静 rapt 全神贯注的>心烦意乱的 reap 收割>种植.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... rapine n 强夺，抢劫 rapt a 着迷的（魂被夺走） rapture n 狂喜，着迷.
外语记忆法,外语记忆法 ... quill 浮标 rapt 欣喜若狂的 space 空间.

list.abs: " For me , a few hours ago , this campaign came to an end , " Mr. Kennedy said in the codaa speech before a rapt audience at Madison Square Garden and on television .面对麦迪逊广场花园中一群狂热的观众，肯尼迪在电视直播演讲的结束部分这样说道，“对我来说，本次竞选运动在几小时之前走到了尽头。
a rapt expression , look , smile , etc., 着迷的表情 , 样子 , 微笑等.
She listened to the speaker rapt attention ., 她全神贯注地听演讲者讲话.
Excuse me,but I need an... ... adj. 非凡的, 奇妙的 be rapt in wonder 惊异得目瞪口呆 be filled with wonder 感到十分惊异.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'transported by religious feeling'): from Latin raptus 'seized', past participle of rapere

entry.def: If someone watches or listens with rapt attention, they are extremely interested or fascinated.

example.ex: I noticed that everyone was watching me with rapt attention...
example.tran: 我注意到大家都在专注地看着我。

example.ex: Delegates sat in rapt silence as Mrs Fisher spoke...
example.tran: 费希尔夫人发言的时候，代表们都一言不发专心致志地听着。

sentences.sentence: "sat completely still, enraptured by the music"
"so intent on this fantastic...narrative that she hardly stirred"- Walter de la Mare

stems_affixes.word_buile: rapt捕,夺+or表名词→掠夺之鸟→猛禽

sentences.en: She sat with rapt expression reading her book.
sentences.cn: 她坐着全神贯注地看书。
